entry.title: WEATHER ADVISORY , Greenstone (Geraldton)
entry.summary: Persons in or near this area should be on the lookout for adverse weather conditions and take necessary safety precautions. Issued: 4:25 PM EST Tuesday 27 December 2022

entry.title: Current Conditions: Light Snow, -10.8°C
entry.summary:
Observed at: Geraldton Airport 6:34 PM EST Tuesday 27 December 2022
Condition: Light Snow
Temperature: -10.8°C
Pressure: 100.6 kPa
Visibility: 2.4 km
Humidity: 87 %
Wind Chill: -18
Dewpoint: -12.6°C
Wind: ENE 15 km/h
Air Quality Health Index: N/A

entry.title: Tuesday night: Snow at times heavy. Temperature rising to minus 7 by morning.
entry.summary: Snow at times heavy. Risk of freezing drizzle late this evening and overnight. Local amount 5 cm. Wind up to 15 km/h. Temperature rising to minus 7 by morning. Wind chill minus 15 this evening and minus 10 overnight. Forecast issued 4:32 PM EST Tuesday 27 December 2022

entry.title: Wednesday: Chance of flurries. Temperature steady near minus 5. POP 60%
entry.summary: Cloudy with 60 percent chance of flurries in the morning and early in the afternoon. Periods of snow or ice pellets beginning early in the afternoon. Risk of freezing drizzle in the morning and early in the afternoon. Wind up to 15 km/h. Temperature steady near minus 5. Wind chill near minus 12. Forecast issued 4:32 PM EST Tuesday 27 December 2022

entry.title: Wednesday night: Periods of snow mixed with ice pellets. Temperature steady near minus 5.
entry.summary: Periods of snow ending before morning then cloudy. Snow or periods of ice pellets in the evening. Wind up to 15 km/h. Temperature steady near minus 5. Wind chill near minus 9. Forecast issued 4:32 PM EST Tuesday 27 December 2022

entry.title: Thursday: Flurries or rain showers. High plus 1.
entry.summary: Flurries or rain showers. High plus 1. Forecast issued 4:32 PM EST Tuesday 27 December 2022
